It's too soon to start planning any trips to see him play again, but there finally was some good news to report on No. 87 on Wednesday. snippet.title: No rush for Crosby thanks to Malkin's heroics
snippet.description: on Sunday. He had been out since Dec. 22 with abdominal problems. … Minnesota forward Mark Parrish returned Saturday after missing two games with a concussion. … Philadelphia forward Joffrey Lupul returned Saturday after missing five weeks with a concussion and bruised spinal cord. … Florida defenseman Ville Peltonen returned Saturday after breaking his foot on Dec. 15. … Boston forward Glen Murray...
